Title: Azure Arc Software Assurance Dashboard
Summary: A comprehensive Azure Workbook for monitoring Software Assurance compliance across your hybrid infrastructure with Arc-enabled servers and SQL Server instances.
Description: The purpose of this repository is to provide an Azure Workbook for monitoring Software Assurance compliance across your Azure Arc-enabled infrastructure. This workbook simplifies license management, enhances visibility into hybrid environments, and enables proactive compliance monitoring for both Windows Servers and SQL Server instances.
